fields.summary: TiAPI: Inconsistency of default value of the text property of a Label between iOS and Android

comments.body: Tested and confirmed on iOS 6 simulator and Samsung Galaxy S2 2.3.6 with Ti SDK 3.1.1 GA and latest 3.2 CI.
